{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"San Francisco Hotel in Union Square","description":"

Experience refined luxury at Hotel Nikko San Francisco, just steps from Union Square. Discover Japanese-inspired elegance in contemporary guest rooms, savor gourmet dining at Kan Pai Sushi Lounge, and enjoy live entertainment at Feinstein’s. With a glass-enclosed rooftop pool, attentive service, and a serene ambiance, every stay promises timeless sophistication and elevated comfort in the heart of the city.

","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Feinstein's at Hotel Nikko","description":"

Step up to Feinstein’s at Hotel Nikko, San Francisco’s premier cabaret nightclub. Enjoy an exceptional lineup of live music, comedy, and concerts in an intimate setting. Pair unforgettable performances with expertly crafted cocktails, fine wines, and light bites for an evening to remember.

","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Hotel Nikko Pet Policy","description":"

We welcome your four-legged family member for a tail-wagging good time in San Francisco. To ensure a comfortable stay for all guests, please note the following guidelines:

  • Dogs must weigh 50 pounds or less. [Service animals are excluded from weight limits.] 
  • Your pet must be fully trained and controlled by you.
  • There is a pet fee of $65 per night with a one-time $150 incidental authorization upon check-in. [Service animals are excluded from this fee.]
  • Under Titles II and III of the ADA, only dogs are recognized as service animals. Pets providing emotional support, well-being, comfort, or companionship are not recognized as service animals.
  • Your dog must be kept on a leash at all times throughout the hotel property; unleashed only in your room.
  • Dogs may not be left unattended at any time, including in a guest room. 
  • Pets are not allowed in any food or beverage outlets, health club, or pool areas of the hotel. [This exclusion does not apply to service dogs.]
  • You are responsible for cleaning up after your pet on hotel property and in the neighborhood.  
  • Please contact the housekeeping department to arrange a convenient time for servicing your room as we cannot service a room if there is a pet in the room.
  • You agree to be responsible for all property damages and/or personal injuries resulting from your dog's presence in the hotel. You further agree to indemnify and hold harmless the hotel, its owners, and its operator from all liability and damage suffered as a result to your service dog or pet's presence in the hotel. The hotel reserves the right to charge your account commensurate to the cost of such damages.
","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Policies for a Seamless Stay","description":"

Our hotel policies are designed to ensure a smooth and enjoyable experience for all guests. From check-in and cancellation guidelines to pet and smoking policies, we provide clear details so you can plan your stay with confidence. Please review these guidelines to help us maintain a welcoming and comfortable environment for everyone.

","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Housekeeping Services","description":"

Experience the pinnacle of cleanliness and comfort with our daily Housekeeping Service. Every day, our meticulous staff refreshes your room with thorough cleaning, fresh linens, and replenished amenities to ensure a pristine, welcoming environment. From dusting and vacuuming to sanitizing bathrooms and organizing furnishings, our dedicated team attends to every detail, so you can relax and enjoy a flawless stay.

Daily housekeeping service is automatically provided. Should you wish to opt out of the cleaning service, kindly use the \"Privacy\" button located next to the light switch by the entrance door.

","read-more-description":"","set-top-padding-to-zero[]":[""],"set-bottom-padding-to-zero[]":["Yes"]}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Chromecast-Ready Rooms","description":"

Stay connected and entertained with our in-room Chromecast service. Simply cast your preferred content from your device to the TV and enjoy seamless streaming of your favorite movies, shows, music, and more—right from the comfort of your room.

","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Hotel Nikko Parking","description":"
  • Hotel Nikko San Francisco does not offer self-parking.
  • Hotel Nikko San Francisco offers Valet parking in our secured, covered garage with 24-hour in-and-out privileges for $75.00 plus tax per night, and $85.00 per night plus tax for oversized vehicles. 
  • The entrance to our valet parking is 180 Ellis Street (corner with Mason Street). 
  • Parking is limited to a first-come, first-served basis.
  • City Park Mason-O'Farrell Garage (325 Mason St. San Francisco 94102. 415-673-6757) offers covered self-parking and is located across the street from Hotel Nikko. Please see the cashier before you exit the building to inquire about in and out privileges. The cost for 24-hour self-parking without in and out privileges starts at $43.00 per day.  
  • For more information, visit https://abmparking.com/facilities/mason-ofarrell-garage-parking/
","read-more-description":""}

{"Id":"##Id##","ParentId":"##ParentId##","title":"Contact Us","description":"

Location: 222 Mason St., San Francisco, California 94102

 

Email: info@hotelnikkosf.com

 

Reservation: (415) 394-1111

 

Hours:

Breakfast: Monday - Friday 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM 

Saturday: 7:00 AM to 12:00 PM, Lunch & Afternoon Tea 11:00 to 1:00 PM 

Sunday: 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM, Brunch & Afternoon Tea: 11:00 AM to 1:00 PM

","read-more-description":""}
